job_description:
Senior Sales Director

About the Company

Dynamic provider of payment solutions

Industry
Financial Services

Type
Privately Held

About the Role

The Senior Sales Director will be responsible for leading and developing the sales function in addition to shaping the commercial growth agenda.

Travel Percent
Less than 10%

Functions
• Sales/Revenue
• Account Management/Optimization

Known Requirements
• Bachelor's degree in an applicable field of study required
• 8 years or more of advancing sales leadership experience required
• Strong background in the enterprise software, SaaS, or FinTech solutions space required
• Defined business and strategic acumen required

Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in an applicable field of study required
8 years or more of advancing sales leadership experience required
Strong background in the enterprise software, SaaS, or FinTech solutions space required
Defined business and strategic acumen required
Responsibilities: The Senior Sales Director will be responsible for leading and developing the sales function in addition to shaping the commercial growth agenda
